title: are we ever gonna get a Super Mario Bros/3D Mario game where u play as Waluigi?
body:
i'm not talking about those off shoot bs games like Mario Party, Mario Tennis, Mario Kart, Mario Golf and all them spin-off games

I'm talking a full fledged Super Mario Bros/3D Mario game where you play as Waluigi

for 30+ years its been "you're the hero Mario and Luigi u gotta defeat Bowser to save Peach" over and over and over

can they break the cycle for once in a real Waluigi game
